sections.heading: in the first degree; penalty.(1) A person commits the offense of assault in the first degree if he or she intentionally or knowingly causes serious bodily injury to another person
sections.text: (2) Assault in the first degree shall be a Class II felony.SourceLaws 1977, LB 38, ยง 23;Laws 2009, LB63, ยง 4.Annotations
